title: The Real World: Space
description:
The Inspiration4 space mission was historic. It may have laid the groundwork for the future of commercial space travel, which offers limitless possibilities for space-themed brand deals and product placements. Axios’s Miriam Kramer (@mirikramer) and Recode’s Rebecca Heilweil (@rebheilweil) explain.

References: 

Read Rebecca’s story here.

Listen to Miriam’s podcast here.
